definition: pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(bound form) mostly used in either 冘豫[you2 yu4] or 冘疑[you2 yi2]
to sleep peacefully (idiom)/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to share the bed/(fig.) to be married
to wait for dawn, one's head resting on a spear (idiom)/fully prepared and biding one's time before the battle
to have a stiff neck after sleeping/(of the head) to touch the pillow
to sleep soundly/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
to lie in total disorder/lying fallen over one another

sentences.english: The resection of occipital condylar and jugular tuber can increase surgical freedom.
sentences.chinese: 枕髁和颈静脉结节的磨除可增加手术视野。

sentences.english: Ball screws for ram adjustment and crossrail adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 滑枕和横梁为滚珠丝杠。

sentences.english: He leans his arms on the door and brings his face to the window.
sentences.chinese: 他把胳膊枕在车门上，把脸凑近窗户。

sentences.english: The basket held a heart shaped pillow to which Brad had secured our rings with pieces of wire.
sentences.chinese: 篮子里有个鸡心状的垫枕，上面用金属线固定住戒指。

sentences.english: She cushioned the baby 's head in her lap.
sentences.chinese: 她让婴儿的头部枕在自己大腿上。

sentences.english: How do you use the Sona Pillow?
Thinking on the pillow of his hand, with poem and tea.
sentences.chinese: 且看他，斜倚沙发手当枕，一卷诗书一杯茶。

sentences.english: It lies on the Ishm River, about 32 km inland.
sentences.chinese: 她枕在伊秀河上，内陆地区长达32公里。

sentences.english: Conclusion Great morphometric variations were found in occipital condyle.
sentences.chinese: 结论枕髁的形态学变异较大。

sentences.english: Sleepers are not allowed to contact each other at double sleeper, short sleeper and sleeper heads.
sentences.chinese: 轨枕之间不允许在双枕，短枕以及枕头处进行接触。

sentences.english: Sleepers are not allowed to contact each other at double sleeper, short sleeper and sleeper heads.
sentences.chinese: 轨枕之间不允许在双枕，短枕以及枕头处进行接触。

sentences.english: She pillowed his head in her lap.
sentences.chinese: 她让被子枕在自己大腿上。

sentences.english: She was sobbing her loneliness into her pillow.
sentences.chinese: 她伏枕啜泣以泄心中的孤寂。

sentences.english: A patient with pure alexia after left occipitoparietal infarction was studied with aphasis examination.
sentences.chinese: 报道一例左顶枕梗塞后纯失读病人。

sentences.english: The pile of books toppled down.
Put all sorts of things together, a fragrance of flower pillow was finally done.
sentences.chinese: 东拼西凑，一个散发着香气的花枕终于做好了。
